name: splatter
story: Alone on a stormy night... enter, if you dare, the unspeakable horror of SPLATTERHOUSE! Hideous ghouls and demented demons leap from every corner in a relentless nightmare of terror. Who's that with a saw? Look out for that axe! Just don't lose your head, as shock after gruesome shock assaults your senses. Your only hope... unleash the monster within yourself and fight back in the grisly mayhem of SPLATTERHOUSE!
